projects.title: Security Controls and Compliance Evaluation
projects.description: Analyzed the company's posture scope, goals, and assessment report, and conducted an internal audit by completing the controls and compliance checklist.

projects.title: Network Traffic Analysis
projects.description: Examined DNS and ICMP traffic in transit using data from a network protocol analyzer tool and determined which network protocol was affected during this incident.

projects.title: Web Service Attack Assessment
skills: Identification of Network Attacks (DoS, Network Intrusion, IP Spoofing)
projects.description: Assessed Wireshark TCP/HTTP logs to identify the type of attack causing network interruption and evaluate its impact on web server performance.

projects.title: Security Incident Report Documentation
projects.description: Investigated a security event by reviewing tcpdump logs to identify the network protocols used and documenting what occurred during the incident.

projects.title: Security Risk Assessment
skills: Understanding of Network Hardening Tools and Practices
projects.description: Performed a security risk assessment to evaluate a data breach and proposed network hardening controls to improve overall security.

projects.title: Security Incident Reporting Using the NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF)
skills: Understanding and Applying the NIST CSF
projects.description: Created a security incident report aligned with the NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) to analyze a network incident.
